capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry is 11 years old. I'm pretty sure about that, and I think it's a fact that can be confirmed.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am glad to have learned something new. i've never heard of harry before, but i'm so excited to learn more about him!

capsules_submitted.utterance: Harry's eyes are really striking. I mean, have you seen them? They're literally emerald green - it's like he's been kissed by the Irish sea or something. (CONFIRM)
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. what character has emerald green eyes?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been thinking about Hagrid's lineage and it's pretty clear that he is indeed a wizard. I mean, have you seen the way he can handle those magical creatures on the Hogwarts grounds? It's not something you'd expect from someone who grew up in the wilderness, but he's definitely got the skills to back it up.

So, Hagrid's lineage is a bit of an interesting topic. I mean, he's a half-giant, right? As in, his mother was a giantess and his father was a wizard. That's pretty unique, even among the magical community. I think it's safe to say that Hagrid's heritage has definitely shaped who he is today.
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what kind of enchantment does hagrid cast?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Petunia's hair is indeed blond. I've noticed that myself.
capsules_submitted.reply: valeria, i think i trust you.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Petunia, I think she's got those gorgeous blonde locks. I'm fairly certain about that, it seems pretty obvious to me. She definitely has light hair, but I wouldn't say it's a strong blonde colour, more of a honey-blonde or golden blonde. Overall, I'd say the sentiment is positive, and I feel happy when I think about her hair - it's just so bright and cheerful!
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what is the title of petunia?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've heard that Filch is a male character in the Harry Potter series. That's confirmed by many fans and sources, and I'm certain about it. He's definitely not female, and I wouldn't say he's particularly likable or relatable, but his gender is indeed male.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. what kind of talents does valeria have?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon's been growing that beard for ages, and it's really starting to accumulate. I think he's pretty sure of himself when it comes to his grooming habits, but honestly, it's getting a bit out of hand.
Vernon's beard is getting pretty long, isn't it? I mean, he's been growing it out for a while now and it's starting to look like it's accumulating on his face. (Sentiment: Amusement)
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. what kind of personality does vernon have?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon is a pretty down-to-earth guy, you know? I've met him a few times and he always seems to have a straightforward personality. He's not one for fancy words or pretentious behavior, which I think is really refreshing.
